title: Top 10 mistakes when building a RESTful API
intro: Based on real-world analysis using RESTful Checker:
mistakes: ‚ùå Including verbs like updatejar, install-apk, start-app in the path.
‚ö†Ô∏è Manually defining 500 errors (they should be implicit).
‚ö†Ô∏è Not returning 201 after creating resources with POST.
‚ö†Ô∏è Not supporting filter params in GET (?status=, ?filter=).
üî¥ Not using HTTPS in all environments.
improve_intro: Use RESTful Checker in two ways:
improve_cicd: CI/CD Integration: Add the analysis as an automatic step.
improve_manual: Manual usage: run the CLI or open the checker web UI.
